message: I propose we split it 75/25, as I understand fairness involves giving more to those who might need it more.
I think 80/20 is a fair split, considering the initial offer was already quite generous.
Considering the decrease in value due to inflation, I propose a split of 64/36. This maintains a fair distribution while accounting for the diminishing worth of money.
Given the continued decrease in value, I'm willing to be more aggressive in my offer to ensure a decent share for myself.
With each round, the value of money decreases. I propose a split of 51.2/48.8 to maintain a fair distribution despite the inflationary pressures.
